'Bronidox', or '5-bromo-5-nitro-1,3-dioxane', is an antimicrobial
chemical compound.

Bronidox causes inhibition of enzyme activity in bacteria.

Bronidox is corrosive to metals. [http://www.products.cognis.com/COGNIS/pro-
dleaf.nsf/(SBU_Catalog)/FFAD30C61B67EFEB41256B4100427DD1/$File/BRONIDOX_r_L_5_E-
.pdf Bronidox], cognis.com
